affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Allied Units
DAMAGE: Pure
cmb:
MANA COST: 100/120/140/160
COOLDOWN: 10
desc: Instantly heals a friendly unit and damages all nearby enemy units.
lore: Priests of the Omniscience are adept at removing impurities from fellow warriors.
name: omniknight_purification

cmb:
MANA COST: 50/50/50/50
COOLDOWN: 14
desc: Creates a powerful divine ward that blocks most magic from affecting a target unit.
notes:
Repel removes most effects from the target when cast. Don't removes positive buffs from allies.
Repel acts the same as other sources of magic immuniy, except it can be purged.
lore: When faced with the pit of sacrifice, Purist's resilience to magic was tested and affirmed.
name: omniknight_repel

desc: Greatly degenerates the movement and attack capabilities of enemy units that stray too near.
lore: The holy embodiment of Purist Thunderwrath is enough to weaken those of lesser faith.
name: omniknight_degen_aura

cmb:
MANA COST: 125/175/250
COOLDOWN: 150
desc:
Omniknight summons a Guardian Angel that grants immunity from physical damage and greatly increases hit point regeneration of nearby allies.
Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter
notes:
Affects allies with magic immunity.
Can be purged.
lore: The All Seeing One casts down his protection over those that Purist calls friend.
name: omniknight_guardian_angel
